actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the distribution of certain funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Delaware Tribe of Indians and Absentee Delaware Tribe of Western Oklahoma in Indian Claims Commission dockets numbered 27A, 241, and 289.

summary.text: Provides for the payment by the Secretary of the Interior of certain judgments to the Kansas Delaware Tribe of Indians, Incorporated without recognizing the corporation as a tribe.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the distribution of certain funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Delaware Tribe of Indians and Absentee Delaware Tribe of Western Oklahoma in Indian Claims Commission dockets numbered 27A, 241, and 289.
